name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Arrives on Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo descends from the sky onto Punk Hazard to confront the G-5 Marines and search for Law.
keyMoments.significance: First physical appearance on Punk Hazard, establishing him as a direct threat and primary antagonist.
keyMoments.quote: Fufufufu... What a mess you've made here.

keyMoments.title: Uses Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo unleashes Conqueror's Haki to instantly knock out the majority of G-5 Marines.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Doflamingo possessing Conqueror's Haki, placing him among the elite few with this rare ability.

keyMoments.title: Parasite Technique Revealed
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo uses his Parasite technique to control the remaining G-5 Marines, forcing them to attack each other.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Doflamingo's ability to control people like puppets using his Devil Fruit strings.
keyMoments.quote: You're all just puppets dancing on my strings.

keyMoments.title: Severely Injures Smoker
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo's attack gravely wounds Vice Admiral Smoker when he shields his subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power difference between Doflamingo and top Marine officers.

abilities.description: Doflamingo can use Haoshoku Haki to knock out weaker-willed individuals.
Doflamingo attaches strings to targets' spines and controls them like puppets, forcing them to move against their will.

relationships.description: Vergo was Doflamingo's undercover agent in the Marines, whose operations were exposed during Punk Hazard.

evolutionMoments.description: Smoker mentions his knowledge of Vergo's connection to Doflamingo's operations.

relationships.description: Doflamingo respects Kuzan's power enough to avoid fighting him.

evolutionMoments.description: Doflamingo backs down when Kuzan appears, not wanting to risk a fight with the former Admiral.

reveals.information: Can control people like puppets with Parasite technique
Vergo's connection to Doflamingo is now known to Smoker

keyMoments.title: Confronts Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Smoker steps forward to defend his G-5 subordinates from Doflamingo's attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's unwavering loyalty to his men and willingness to face a Warlord.
keyMoments.quote: Don't you dare lay another finger on my men, Doflamingo!

keyMoments.title: Reveals Knowledge of Vergo
keyMoments.description: Smoker confronts Doflamingo about Vergo and his underworld operations.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Smoker now knows too much about Doflamingo's criminal network, making him a target.
keyMoments.quote: I know all about Vergo and your dirty operations, Joker!

keyMoments.title: Uses Body as Shield
keyMoments.description: Smoker shields his subordinates with his own body, taking a devastating attack from Doflamingo.
keyMoments.significance: Ultimate display of Smoker's character - putting his life on the line for his men.

relationships.description: Kuzan considers Smoker a friend and saves his life from Doflamingo.

evolutionMoments.description: Kuzan appears to save Smoker, calling him his friend.

relationships.description: Smoker knows about Doflamingo's underworld operations and stands against him.

evolutionMoments.description: Smoker confronts Doflamingo and is nearly killed by him.

reveals.information: Knows about Vergo's connection to Doflamingo

keyMoments.title: Appears on Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Kuzan suddenly appears on Punk Hazard to save Smoker from Doflamingo's finishing blow.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance since leaving the Marines, raising questions about his current status and why he was on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.quote: Mind stepping aside, Doflamingo? That man is my friend.

keyMoments.title: Forces Doflamingo to Retreat
keyMoments.description: Kuzan's presence causes Doflamingo to back down and leave Punk Hazard without fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even as a former Admiral, Kuzan commands enough respect and power to make a Warlord retreat.

relationships.description: Kuzan considers Smoker a friend and intervenes to save his life.

evolutionMoments.description: Kuzan saves Smoker from certain death at Doflamingo's hands.

reveals.information: Present on Punk Hazard for unknown reasons
Still cares about former Marine colleagues like Smoker

keyMoments.title: Reveals Plan to Defeat Kaidou
keyMoments.description: Luffy explains to his crew that the alliance's true goal is to take down Yonko Kaidou.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Luffy's commitment to taking on one of the Four Emperors, marking a major escalation in his ambitions.
keyMoments.quote: We're going to take down Kaidou, one of the Four Emperors!

reveals.information: Committed to alliance plan to defeat Kaidou

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Explains Alliance Strategy
keyMoments.description: Law discusses with Luffy the strategy of targeting Doflamingo's SMILE production to weaken Kaidou.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Law's strategic thinking and the multi-layered plan to take down a Yonko.
